channel.title: Searching for Hoster
channel.description:
I'm searching for hoster for Capescape Reborn! This will hopefully become a champion server.
Requirements: - My already know that they can host a server. - Server must be online fairly often. - Hoster must be able to receive files often, so that server can be updated regularly.
Hoster gets instant co-ownership. If you just wanna host to steal source from me, don't bother. Apply below!
